body:
Comment 6: 
Re #3, if we package amd64 and 386 version together, what version do you think
should live in bin/?

yes, the msi installer could change them to the version appropriate for the machine,
but how about the zip distribution?

i have memory that we've discussed this at Go 1.0 times, and the conclusion is that
cross compilation is advanced feature so best left out of the binary distribution.
Those who need it can always build Go from source.
